channel.title: Jquery on This Site
channel.description: Recent content in Jquery on This Site

item.title: Jquery Essentials W3 Schools Summary
item.description: 1 - Basic syntax $(selector).action() 2 - The Document Ready Event $(document).ready(function(){ // jQuery methods go here... }); // shorter $(function(){ // jQuery methods go here... }); 3 - Selects the first <li> element of the first <ul> $("ul li:first") 4 - Selects the first <li> element of every <ul> $("ul li:first-child") 5 - Selects all <a> elements with a target attribute value equal to "_blank" $("a[target='_blank']") 6 - Selects all <a> elements with a target attribute value NOT equal to "_blank" $("a[target!
